title: Garoke and Arose
description: 'Garoke and Arose' is a story that has been lost to history.Set 27,000 years ago in what will be later known as England, Europe, the Middle East, Egypt and North Africa, it describes the experiences and courage of the young tribesman, Garoke.After being expelled from his tribe, Garoke navigates the unknown landscape of what to us is an ancient world. His quest is to find and rescue his love Arose, who has been captured by slave traders.P.S. 'Garoke and Arose' is an excerpt from 'The Earth Priestesses of Blue Circle' by D.A. Maclean.
author: Duncan Alexander Maclean
